attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We reject the concept of allowing Local Authorities to make additional charges for normal every day rubbish collection, either by volume or weight. This will encourage fly tipping or people to place rubbish in their neighbours bins.
The current exorbitant Council tax already covers the cost of collection.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
